title: Ricardo Zielinski
text:
Ricardo Alberto Zielinski, (born 14 October 1959) is an Argentine <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and former player. He is the current <a href="head%20coach">head coach</a> for <a href="Estudiantes%20de%20La%20Plata">Estudiantes de La Plata</a>.
Biography.
"El Ruso" started his playing career at <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20San%20Telmo">San Telmo</a> in 1979.
Zielinski was played in other clubs as <a href="Argentino%20de%20Quilmes">Argentino de Quilmes</a>, <a href="Chacarita%20Juniors">Chacarita Juniors</a>, <a href="Deportivo%20Mandiy%C3%BA">Deportivo Mandiyú</a>, <a href="Deportivo%20Laferrere">Deportivo Laferrere</a> and <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Ituzaing%C3%B3">Ituzaingó</a>.
He was started his manager career in 1994, as coach of his former club <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Ituzaing%C3%B3">Ituzaingó</a>.
From 15 December 2010 to 30 July 2016, Zielinski was the manager of <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Belgrano">Belgrano</a>. On 29 August, Zielinski signed with <a href="Racing%20Club%20de%20Avellaneda">Racing Club</a>.
Personal life.
Born in Argentina, Zielinski is of Polish descent.
